column3: This information category gathers together descriptors used for assigning names and types to a group, both at present and historically.
This information category gathers together descriptors relevant to the tracking of the formation and dissolution of a group.
This category is used to bring together information relevant to the composition of a group with relation to its parts and its belonging to wider groups.
This information category gathers together descriptors relevant to tracking the relations held between a group and other people or actors.
This information category gathers together descriptors used for documenting different activities that a group is known to have been involved in or with.
This category is used to gather together information regarding significant descriptions given of a group by known authors/sources.
This information category is used to bring together information relevant to the work which have been produced by the documented group.
This category gathers together information regarding the seat of a group.
This information category gathers together different documentary descriptors that provide reference information with regards to a group.
